banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: How jiu jitsu taught me to be a better employee
videoData.socialTitle: How jiu jitsu taught me to be a better employee

nodes.whoTheyAre: After exploring careers in scientific research, sales and education, Francesca Simon-Carboni became an officer in Custody Cash at State Street. Simon-Carboni is a third Kyu Brown Belt in American jiu jitsu (Hakko Ryu jiu jitsu) and is studying to become a certified jiu jitsu instructor. She uses her skills from jiu jitsu practice to advance in her career.

videoData.description: Can jiu jitsu make you a better employee? Francesca Simon-Carboni would never have been described as calm or level-headed in a crisis... until she started taking jiu jitsu. Francesca shares how the skills she built in jiu jitsu practice helped her advance in her career off the mat.
videoData.socialDescription: Can jiu jitsu make you a better employee? Francesca Simon-Carboni would never have been described as calm or level-headed in a crisis... until she started taking jiu jitsu. Francesca shares how the skills she built in jiu jitsu practice helped her advance in her career off the mat.
